about_the_game:
Runehaven is a voxel-based atmospheric first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore eerie, procedurally generated dungeons, battle vile creatures, solve puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and dodge deadly traps in your quest for survival!

Craft spells by combining different runes using a magic system inspired by Ultima and Arx Fatalis!

Experience a fully destructible voxel environment. Nearly everything in the game can be destroyed, either by the player or the enemies!

Features

  • A runic magic system that is easy to learn but offers a lot of complexity. 

  • Voxel physics with a fully destructible voxel environment.

  • Fully procedural dungeons where every map layout is unique.

  • Choose between various melee, ranged and magic weapons.

  • Dodge deadly traps.

  • Voxel graphics with physically based rendering.

  • Explore unique biomes.

  • Permanent death.

  • Solve various puzzles.

  • Fight against different monsters.

  • Discover secrets.

  • Level up your character.

  • Modding support.
